data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Centre, Burkina Faso who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Centre, Burkina Faso
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 226,039 believers in Centre to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Centre that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Centre. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Bobo Madare people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Centre, Burkina Faso.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Centre.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Centre, Burkina Faso has a population of 2,136,600.

We estimate Centre has 226,039 people who might know Jesus, 226,285 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,684,275 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Centre, Burkina Faso and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

location.name: Centre
location.people_groups_list: Pana, Sama, Dogose, Hausa, Dagaari Dioula, Wala, Tenbo, Loron
